any aspect ratio less than 1.77 makes the background image too short and therefore the background color is showing.

You could maybe fade the background image to black and use `html {background-color: black;}`
@Alex: Most browsers have a responsive design mode in their dev tools. Just select a moblile-like resolution (in portrait) to replicate the issue.
Yeah some of your posts went away. I can see your 1.5.0 bwoi.bit update but not the 1.6.0 one.
